summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Fifth Avenue West from Olympic Place to Kinnear Place and Kinnear Place from Fifth Avenue to Park Place in the City of Seattle, by constructing sidewalk under Ordinance No. 13886, creating Local Improvement District No. 1263 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
